mapper.select: select id,redisId,title,opendate,content,url,pdfURL,areaCode,catchType,noticeType, province,city,county,provinceCode,cityCode,countyCode,photoUrl,catchtype as `type`, snatchNumber,areaRank,source from test.test_notice where id>=(SELECT id from test.hunan_notice order by id limit #{param1},1) ORDER by id limit #{param2}
